column4: my little brother's wubi xubuntu install broke epicly during a dist-upgrade... rather than fix it, we decided to uninstall it and start over
the uninstall worked fine, but now wubi.exe is telling me "Could not download the metalink and therefor the ISO"
a workaround would be to download the iso yourself manually and putting it in the same directory as wubi.exe, then starting wubi.exe
